languages.text: {n}Молодой человек на мгновение задумывается.{/n} "Это возможно. Вполне возможно. Вся коллекция обойдется в приличную сумму, но вы вольны забрать их прямо сейчас!"
{n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой человек на мгновение задумывается.{/n} "Это возможно. Вполне возможно. Вся коллекция обойдется в приличную сумму, но вы вольны забрать их прямо сейчас!"

{n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"

languages.text: {n}彼は少しだけ考えた。{/n}「いいでしょう。悪い話じゃありません。コレクションをまるごと買い取るとそれなりの金額になりますが、今なら自由にお持ち帰りいただけますよ！」
languages.original_text: {n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は少しだけ考えた。{/n}「いいでしょう。悪い話じゃありません。コレクションをまるごと買い取るとそれなりの金額になりますが、今なら自由にお持ち帰りいただけますよ！」

languages.text: {n}他想了一会儿。{/n}“没问题，一点问题都没有。买下所有的藏品要花一大笔钱，但只要你付了钱，就可以立刻把他们带走！”
languages.original_text: {n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}他想了一会儿。{/n}“没问题，一点问题都没有。买下所有的藏品要花一大笔钱，但只要你付了钱，就可以立刻把他们带走！”

languages.text: {n}Reflexiona durante un instante.{/n} «Todo es verlo. De hecho, sí. La colección entera le costará una buena suma, pero ¡puede llevársela cuando quiera!».
languages.original_text: {n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Reflexiona durante un instante.{/n} «Todo es verlo. De hecho, sí. La colección entera le costará una buena suma, pero ¡puede llevársela cuando quiera!».

languages.text: {n}Il réfléchit un instant.{/n} « Nous pouvons faire affaire, ce sera même avec grand plaisir. L'achat de la ménagerie dans son intégralité représente une somme considérable, mais vous pourrez les emporter immédiatement ! »
languages.original_text: {n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Il réfléchit un instant.{/n} « Nous pouvons faire affaire, ce sera même avec grand plaisir. L'achat de la ménagerie dans son intégralité représente une somme considérable, mais vous pourrez les emporter immédiatement ! »

languages.text: {n}Er denkt kurz nach.{/n} "Das wäre möglich. Kein Problem. Die gesamte Sammlung wird Euch ein hübsches Sümmchen kosten, aber Ihr könnt sie sofort mitnehmen!"
languages.original_text: {n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Er denkt kurz nach.{/n} "Das wäre möglich. Kein Problem. Die gesamte Sammlung wird Euch ein hübsches Sümmchen kosten, aber Ihr könnt sie sofort mitnehmen!"

languages.text: {n}Bir anlığına düşünüyor.{/n} "Ayarlayabiliriz. Hiç sorun değil. Tüm koleksiyonun maliyeti yüksek olsa da onları hemen şu saniye alabilirsiniz!"
languages.original_text: {n}He thinks for a moment.{/n} "That can be done. Very much so. The entire collection will cost you a tidy sum, but you're free to take them away right now!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir anlığına düşünüyor.{/n} "Ayarlanabilir. Hiç sorun değil. Tüm koleksiyon yüklü bir maliyet demektir ancak onları isterseniz şu an alabilirsiniz!"
